Module com.ims.software
Package com.ims.software.Controller

Class addProductController

java.lang.Object
com.ims.software.Controller.addProductController
All Implemented Interfaces:
Initializable
public class addProductController extends Object implements Initializable
This class is intended to allow the user to add a product to the inventory. This controller is made to control the addProduct.fxml
Author:
Celeste Catala
